pgb_download.description: Download a book from Project Gutenberg

id_or_title.description: Book ID or title to download

file.description: Filename to save the downloaded text

pgb_download_html.description: Download a book in HTML format from Project Gutenberg

id_or_title.description: Book ID or title to download in HTML format

file.description: Filename to save the downloaded HTML

pgb_serve_book.description: Start an HTTP server to serve an ebook from the ebooks directory

filename.description: Filename of the ebook to serve (must exist in data/ebooks)

port.description: Port to run the HTTP server on

pgb_electron.description: Launch Electron window to display an ebook

filename.description: HTML filename to display in Electron window (must exist in data/ebooks)

pgb_info.description: Get book details from Project Gutenberg

id_or_title.description: Book ID or title to get information about
